	a) 3x − e^x = 0 for 1 ≤ x ≤ 2

	b) 2x + 3 cos x − e^x = 0 for 0 ≤ x ≤ 1
	
You may not find any root , because f(a)*f(b) > 0 !
Iter	|	The Absolute Error	|	The Relative Error
   1	|	0.5000000000		|	1.0000000000

	d1) x + 1 − 2 sin πx = 0 for 0 ≤ x ≤ 0.5
	
You may not find any root , because f(a)*f(b) > 0 !

   1	|	0.2500000000		|	1.0000000000

	d2) x + 1 − 2 sin πx = 0 for 0.5 ≤ x ≤ 1

You may not find any root , because f(a)*f(b) > 0 !
